phrase: I was skiing over the weekend... tried moguls, which jumping over those big hills, I tend to get my strap caught on my finger... it bent it back a bit.
I tried putting ice on it. I've been taking ibuprofen, but it's still very painful.
appendix taken out when I was 18
tenderness over your distal phalanx... pain with flexion
no fractures... everything lines up pretty... normal
diagnosis would be a hand... contusion... tip of the finger
splint... Motrin 600 mg every 6 hours for a week
